title: 自己电脑装的forge服务器装mod之后崩溃
author: FateStop
txt_content:
本帖最后由 FateStop 于 2020-6-9 23:34 编辑 

安装好forge服务端之后能打开，能用能进去，之后装了mod之后就打不开了，没有出现

replies.author: 森林蝙蝠
replies.txt_content:
[22:40:43] [main/WARN] [mixin]: Error loading class: com/mojang/realmsclient/RealmsMainScreen (java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: The specified class 'com.mojang.realmsclient.RealmsMainScreen' was not found)
[22:40:43] [main/WARN] [mixin]: @mixin target com.mojang.realmsclient.RealmsMainScreen was not found mixins.liteloader.client.optional.json:MixinRealmsMainScreen
[22:40:43] [main/FATAL] [mixin]: Mixin apply failed mixins.liteloader.core.json:MixinMinecraftServer -> net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer: org.spongepowered.asm.mixin.injection.throwables.InvalidInjectionException @Inject annotation on handler$onServerTick$zba000 could not find any targets matching 'D' in the target class net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer. Using refmap mixins.liteloader.core.refmap.json
org.spongepowered.asm.mixin.injection.throwables.InvalidInjectionException: @Inject annotation on handler$onServerTick$zba000 could not find any targets matching 'D' in the target class net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer. Using refmap mixins.liteloader.core.refmap.json
你把客户端的mod装到服务端去了，从服务端移除liteloader和所有依赖于它的mod，还有optifine。

replies.author: FateStop
replies.txt_content: 坐等大佬，刚会开服几天

replies.author: IceCC
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 All.Hail.CCC 于 2020-6-9 23:54 编辑 
FateStop 发表于 2020-6-9 23:35
坐等大佬，刚会开服几天

不是什么模组都可以丢到服务端的，
比如显血，高清修复，自动汉化更新这些辅助性的模组不要放到服务端，我只是列举几个模组，你加的挺多这种类型，我现在用手机不好一个一个列出来。自己理解一下
